{"id":603133026,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 8 months","timestamp":1639742726,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"76 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/603133026/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers","memory":"75.7 MB","code":"/**\n * Definition for singly-linked list.\n * struct ListNode {\n *     int val;\n *     ListNode *next;\n *     ListNode() : val(0), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x) : val(x), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x, ListNode *next) : val(x), next(next) {}\n * };\n */\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    ListNode* addThreeNumbers(ListNode* l1, ListNode* l2, int c) {\n        ListNode * result = new ListNode();\n        int a = 0, b = 0;\n        if(l1 == nullptr && l2 == nullptr && c == 0) return nullptr;\n        else if(l1 == nullptr && l2 == nullptr){\n            result->val = c;\n            return result;\n        }\n        if(l1 != nullptr){\n            a = l1->val;\n            l1 = l1->next;\n        }\n        if(l2 != nullptr){\n            b = l2->val;\n            l2 = l2->next;\n        }\n        int res = a+b+c;\n        if(a+b+c >= 10){\n            result->val = res%10;\n            result->next = addThreeNumbers(l1,l2,1);\n        }\n        else {\n            result->val = res;\n            result->next = addThreeNumbers(l1,l2,0);\n        }\n        return result;\n    }\n    ListNode* addTwoNumbers(ListNode* l1, ListNode* l2) {\n        return addThreeNumbers(l1,l2, 0);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
